6530  curr->instructions.rbegin(), e = curr->instructions.rend();
6531  i != e; ++i) {
6532  instrNum--;
6533  Instruction *currInstr = *i;
6534  float currDelay = curr->instrDelay[instrNum];
6535  partialDelay += currDelay;
6536  report << "(" << ftostr(currDelay) << " ns) --- ("
6537  << ftostr(partialDelay) << " ns) --- " << *currInstr
6538  << "\n";
6539  }
6540  report << "\n";
6541  }
6542  report << "\n";
6543 }
6544 
6545 void GenerateRTL::addToOverallPathList() {
6546  int num_paths = LEGUP_CONFIG->getParameterInt("TIMING_NUM_PATHS");
6547  list<GenerateRTL::PATH*> *pathList = alloc->getOverallLongestPaths();
6548  int pathNum = 0;
6549  for (std::list<GenerateRTL::PATH*>::iterator i = func_path.begin(), e =
6550  func_path.end(); i != e; ++i) {
6551  pathNum++;
6552  // In worst case, the overall n longest paths are all from the same function
6553  if (pathNum > num_paths)
6554  break;
6555  pathList->push_front(*i);
6556  }
6557  pathList->sort(pathComp);
6558 }
6559 
6560 // Calculates the n longest paths and stores in func_path
6561 // Gets called once for each function
6562 void GenerateRTL::timingAnalysis(SchedulerDAG *dag) {
6563  vector<Instruction *> instrs;
6564  vector<float> instrDelay;
6565  for (FiniteStateMachine::iterator state = fsm->begin(), se = fsm->end();
6566  state != se; ++state) {
6567  for (State::iterator instr = state->begin(), ie = state->end();
6568  instr != ie; ++instr) {
6569  Instruction *I = *instr;
6570  State *rootState = fsm->getStartState(I);
6571  int numSuccInState = getNumSuccInState(I, fsm);
6572  if (!numSuccInState)
6573  calculateDelay(dag, I, 0, rootState, fsm, &func_path, instrs,
6574  instrDelay);
6575  }
6576  }
6577  formatted_raw_ostream report(alloc->getTimingReportFile());
6578  func_path.sort(pathComp);
6579  printPath(report, &func_path);
6580  addToOverallPathList();
6581 }
6582 
6583 // print out the data flow graph for each basic block
6584 void GenerateRTL::printSchedulingDFGDot(SchedulerDAG &dag) {
6585  for (Function::iterator bb = Fp->begin(), be = Fp->end(); bb != be; ++bb) {
6586  std::string FileError;
6587  std::string fileName = "dfg." + getLabel(Fp) + "_" + getLabel(bb)
6588  + ".dot";
6589  raw_fd_ostream dfgFile(fileName.c_str(), FileError, llvm::sys::fs::F_None);
6590  assert(FileError.empty() && "Error opening dot files");
6591  formatted_raw_ostream out(dfgFile);
6592  dag.printDFGDot(out, bb);
6593  }
6594 }
6595 
6596 void GenerateRTL::printSchedulingInfo() {
6597  formatted_raw_ostream out(alloc->getSchedulingFile());
6598 
6599  out << "Target Family: " << LEGUP_CONFIG->getDeviceFamily() << "\n";
6600  out << "Clock period constraint: " << sched->getClockPeriodConstraint()
6601  << "ns\n";
6602 
6603  std::map<BasicBlock*, unsigned> bbCount;
6604  out << "Start Function: " << Fp->getName() << "\n";
6605  //std::ofstream out("scheduling.legup.rpt", std::ios::app);
6606  for (FiniteStateMachine::iterator state = fsm->begin(), se = fsm->end();
6607  state != se; ++state) {
6608  out << "state: " << state->getName() << "\n";
6609  BasicBlock *bb = state->getBasicBlock();
6610  bbCount[bb]++;
6611  for (State::iterator instr = state->begin(), ie = state->end();
6612  instr != ie; ++instr) {
6613  Instruction *I = *instr;
6614  if (bb && I == bb->getTerminator())
6615  continue;
6616  assert(fsm->getStartState(I) == state);
6617  out << " " << getValueStr(I) << " (endState: "
6618  << fsm->getEndState(I)->getName() << ")\n";
6619  }
6620  // print out branch:
6621  if (bb && state->isTerminating()) {
6622  out << " " << getValueStr(bb->getTerminator()) << "\n";
6623  }
6624  out << " ";
6625  state->printTransition(out);
6626  out << "\n";
6627  }
6628  out << "\n";
6629  for (std::map<BasicBlock*, unsigned>::iterator i = bbCount.begin(), e =
6630  bbCount.end(); i != e; ++i) {
6631  BasicBlock *bb = i->first;
6632  if (!bb)
6633  continue;
6634  unsigned count = i->second;
6635  out << "Basic Block: " << getLabel(bb) << " Num States: " << count
6636  << "\n";
6637  }
6638  out << "End Function: " << Fp->getName() << "\n";
6639  out
6640  << "--------------------------------------------------------------------------------\n\n";
6641 }
6642 
6643 void GenerateRTL::printScheduleGanttChart() {
6644  std::string Filename = "gantt." + Fp->getName().str() + ".tex";
6645  //errs() << "Writing '" << Filename << "'...";
6646 
6647  std::string ErrorInfo;
6648  raw_fd_ostream file(Filename.c_str(), ErrorInfo, llvm::sys::fs::F_None);
6649  if (!ErrorInfo.empty()) {
6650  errs() << "Error opening file: " << Filename << " for writing!\n";
6651  assert(0);
6652  }
6653 
6654  file << "\\documentclass[landscape]{article}\n";
6655  //file << "\\usepackage{fullpage}\n";
6656  file << "\\usepackage{gantt}\n";
6657  file << "\\pagestyle{empty}\n";
6658  file << "\\begin{document}\n";
6659  //file << "\\setlength{\\pdfpagewidth}{100in}\n";
6660  //file << "\\setlength{\\pdfpageheight}{200in}\n";
6661  //file << "Function: " << verilogName(Fp) << "\n";
6662 
6663  std::vector<GanttBar> gantt;
6664  std::map<Instruction *, GanttBar> instructions;
6665 
6666  FiniteStateMachine *fsm = sched->getFSM(Fp);
6667 
6668  int instNum = 1;
6669  int stateNum = 1;
6670  for (FiniteStateMachine::iterator state = ++fsm->begin(), se = fsm->end();
6671  state != se; ++state) {
6672  for (State::iterator instr = state->begin(), ie = state->end();
6673  instr != ie; ++instr) {
6674  GanttBar bar;
6675  bar.inst = *instr;
6676  bar.x = stateNum;
6677  bar.y = instNum;
6678  bar.duration = Scheduler::getNumInstructionCycles(bar.inst);
6679  if (bar.duration == 0) {
6680  bar.duration = 1;
6681  }
6682  gantt.push_back(bar);
6683  instructions[*instr] = bar;
6684  //errs() << *bar.inst << "\n";
6685  instNum++;
6686  }
6687  stateNum++;
6688  if (state->isTerminating() && !gantt.empty()) {
6689  printGantt(file, gantt, instructions, stateNum);
6690  instNum = 1;
6691  stateNum = 1;
6692  gantt.clear();
6693  instructions.clear();
6694  }
6695  }
6696 
6697  file << "\\end{document}\n";
6698 }
6699 
6700 void GenerateRTL::printGantt(raw_fd_ostream &file, std::vector<GanttBar> &gantt,
6701  std::map<Instruction *, GanttBar> &instructions, int stateNum) {
6702 
6703  unsigned rows = gantt.size() + 1;
6704  unsigned cols = stateNum;
6705  unsigned start = 0;
6706  unsigned increment = 1;
6707  unsigned span = 1;
6708  unsigned end = cols - 1;
6709 
6710  file << "\\begin{figure}\n";
6711  file << "\\begin{gantt}[fontsize=\\scriptsize]{" << rows << "}{" << cols
6712  << "}\n";
6713  file << "\\begin{ganttitle}\n";
6714  file << "\\numtitle{" << start << "}{" << increment << "}{" << end << "}{"
6715  << span << "}\n";
6716  file << "\\end{ganttitle}\n";
6717 
6718  //errs() << "gantt: " << gantt.size() << "\n";
6719  for (std::vector<GanttBar>::iterator bar = gantt.begin(), bare =
6720  gantt.end(); bar != bare; ++bar) {
6721  std::string stripped;
6722  raw_string_ostream stream(stripped);
6723  Instruction *I = bar->inst;
6724  stream << *I;
6725  replaceAll(stripped, "%", "\\%");
6726  replaceAll(stripped, "_", "\\_");
6727  // limit the size of the instruction string
6728  unsigned limit = 80;
6729  if (stripped.length() > limit) {
6730  stripped.erase(limit);
6731  stripped = stripped + "...";
6732  }
6733 
6734  file << "\\ganttbar{" << stripped << "}{" << bar->x << "}{"
6735  << bar->duration << "}\n";
6736 
6737  for (Value::user_iterator i = I->user_begin(), e = I->user_end(); i != e;
6738  ++i) {
6739  Instruction *use = dyn_cast<Instruction>(*i);
6740  if (!use)
6741  continue;
6742  //assert(instructions.find(use) != instructions.end());
6743  if (instructions.find(use) == instructions.end())
6744  continue;
6745  GanttBar useGantt = instructions[use];
6746  file << "\\ganttcon{" << bar->x + bar->duration << "}{" << bar->y
6747  << "}{" << useGantt.x << "}{" << useGantt.y << "}\n";
6748  }
6749  }
6750 
6751  /*
6752  \ganttbar{\%i.04 = phi i32 [ 0, \%bb.nph ], [ \%3, \%bb ]}{1}{0}
6753  \ganttbarcon{\%scevgep5 = getelementptr \%b, \%i.04}{1}{1}
6754  \ganttbarcon{\%0 = load \%scevgep5}{2}{2}
6755  \ganttbar{\%scevgep6 = getelementptr \%c, \%i.04}{1}{1}
6756  \ganttbarcon{\%1 = load \%scevgep6}{3}{2}
6757  \ganttbarcon{\%2 = add nsw i32 \%1, \%0}{5}{1}
6758  \ganttbar{\%scevgep = getelementptr \%a, \%i.04}{1}{1}
6759  \ganttbarcon{store \%2, \%scevgep}{6}{1}
6760  \ganttcon{1}{1}{1}{7}
6761  \ganttcon{1}{1}{1}{4}
6762  \ganttcon{4}{3}{5}{6}
6763  % x, y x, y
6764  \ganttcon{6}{6}{6}{8}
6765  \ganttbar{\%3 = add \%i.04, 1}{1}{1}
6766  \ganttcon{1}{1}{1}{9}
6767  \ganttbarcon{\%exitcond = eq \%3, 100}{2}{1}
6768  \ganttbarcon{br \%exitcond, \%bb2, \%bb}{7}{0}
6769  */
6770  file << "\\end{gantt}\n";
6771  assert(!gantt.empty());
6772  //file << "\\caption{" << "Function: " << verilogName(Fp) << " "
6773  //<< *gantt[0].inst->getParent() << "}\n";
6774 
6775  file << "\\end{figure}\n";
6776 
6777 }
6778 
6779 void GenerateRTL::scheduleOperations() {
6780  dag = new SchedulerDAG;
6781  dag->runOnFunction(*Fp, alloc);
6782 
6783  if (!LEGUP_CONFIG->getParameterInt("NO_DFG_DOT_FILES")) {
6784  printSchedulingDFGDot(*dag);
6785  }
6786 
6787  sched = new SDCScheduler(alloc);
6788 
6789  sched->schedule(Fp, dag);
6790  fsm = sched->getFSM(Fp);
6791 
6792  modifyFSMForAllLoopPipelines();
6793 
6794  // Warning: the FSM at this point is missing a few TransitionVariables.
6795  // these will be added later when we have access to the RTLModule
6796  createBindingFSM();
6797 }
6798 
6799 void GenerateRTL::addTagOffsetParameterToModule() {
6800 
6801  RTLSignal *tag_offset = rtl->addParam("tag_offset", "0");
6802  tag_offset->setWidth(RTLWidth(utostr(alloc->getTagSize() - 1)));
6803  std::string bottomBits =
6804  utostr((int)alloc->getDataLayout()->getPointerSizeInBits() -
6805  alloc->getTagSize()) +
6806  "'d0";
6807  std::string tag_addr_offset_value = "{tag_offset, " + bottomBits + "}";
6808  RTLSignal *tag_addr_offset =
6809  rtl->addParam("tag_addr_offset", tag_addr_offset_value);
6810  tag_addr_offset->setWidth(RTLWidth("`MEMORY_CONTROLLER_ADDR_SIZE-1"));
6811 }
6812 
6813 void GenerateRTL::addDebugRtl() {
6814  RTLSignal *sigCurState;
6815  RTLSignal *sigActiveInst;
6816 
6817  // outs() << "Adding debug instrumentation to " << Fp->getName().str() <<
6818  // "\n";
6819 
6820  fsm->buildStatePredecessors();
6821 
6822  // Add output for the instance Id
6823  sigActiveInst = rtl->addOut(DEBUG_SIGNAL_NAME_ACTIVE_INST,
6824  alloc->getDbgInfo()->getInstanceIdBits());
6825 
6826  // Add output for the current state (in encoded, or one-hot)
6827  if (alloc->getDbgInfo()->getOptionPreserveOneHot()) {
6828  string sigCurStateName = DEBUG_SIGNAL_NAME_CURRENT_STATE;
6829  sigCurState = rtl->addWire(sigCurStateName, fsm->size());
6830  } else {
6831  string sigCurStateName = DEBUG_SIGNAL_NAME_CURRENT_STATE;
6832  sigCurState =
6833  rtl->addOut(sigCurStateName, alloc->getDbgInfo()->getStateBits());
6834  }
6835 
6836  // Add Parent Instance Parameter
6837  RTLSignal *parentInstanceParam =
6838  rtl->addParam(DEBUG_PARAM_NAME_PARENT_INST, "0");
6839  parentInstanceParam->setWidth(alloc->getDbgInfo()->getInstanceIdBits());
6840 
6841  // Add Instance Parameter
6842  string instanceParamVal = DEBUG_VERILOG_FUNC_NAME_INSTANCE_MAPPING;
6843  instanceParamVal += "(";
6844  instanceParamVal += DEBUG_PARAM_NAME_PARENT_INST;
6845  instanceParamVal += ")";
6846 
6847  RTLSignal *instanceParam =
6848  rtl->addParam(DEBUG_PARAM_NAME_INST, instanceParamVal);
6849  instanceParam->setWidth(alloc->getDbgInfo()->getInstanceIdBits());
6850 
6851  // Create logic to drive the current state output.
6852  // For one-hot encoding, each bit of the output will be driven by some logic
6853  // (state == XXX)
6854  // For fully encoded, the output will be driven by a series of statements
6855  // such as: if (state == S_XXX) then out = 1
6856  vector<RTLSignal *> statesOneHot;
6857  int stateCount = 0;
6858  for (FiniteStateMachine::iterator state = fsm->begin(),
6859  state_end = fsm->end();
6860  state != state_end; ++state) {
6861 
6862  Function *calledFunc = state->getCalledFunction();
6863  if (calledFunc) {
6864  // outs() << "Called function: " <<
6865  //calledFunc->getName().str() << "\n";
6866 
6867  // The debugger outputs the active instance/state to the top-level
6868  // The instance/state wires need to be driven by the child module
6869  // during
6870  // a function call.
6871  string calledFuncName = verilogName(calledFunc);
6872 
6873  string dbgActiveInstanceSigName =
6874  calledFuncName + "_" + DEBUG_SIGNAL_NAME_ACTIVE_INST;
6875  string dbgCurrentStateSigName =
6876  calledFuncName + "_" + DEBUG_SIGNAL_NAME_CURRENT_STATE;
6877 
6878  RTLSignal *sigActiveInstChild = rtl->addWire(
6879  dbgActiveInstanceSigName,
6880  RTLWidth(alloc->getDbgInfo()->getInstanceIdBits()));
6881  connectSignalToDriverInState(sigActiveInst, sigActiveInstChild,
6882  state);
6883 
6884  if (!alloc->getDbgInfo()->getOptionPreserveOneHot()) {
6885  RTLSignal *sigCurStateChild =
6886  rtl->addWire(dbgCurrentStateSigName,
6887  RTLWidth(alloc->getDbgInfo()->getStateBits()));
6888  connectSignalToDriverInState(sigCurState, sigCurStateChild,
6889  state);
6890  }
6891 
6892  } else {
6893  // For every state (except function calls), the state number
6894  // needs to be connected to a wire, which goes out to the
6895  // debugger
6896  if (!alloc->getDbgInfo()->getOptionPreserveOneHot()) {
6897  RTLConst *constVal = new RTLConst(
6898  getStateSignal(state)->getValue(), sigCurState->getWidth());
6899  connectSignalToDriverInState(sigCurState, constVal, state);
6900  }
6901  }
6902 
6903  if (alloc->getDbgInfo()->getOptionPreserveOneHot()) {
6904  string tempStateName = "stateOneHot";
6905  tempStateName += std::to_string(stateCount);
6906  RTLSignal *tempState = rtl->addWire(tempStateName, RTLWidth(1));
6907  statesOneHot.push_back(tempState);
6908 
6909  if (LEGUP_CONFIG->getParameterInt("CASEX")) {
6910 
6911  RTLOp *op = rtl->addOp(RTLOp::Trunc);
6912  string stateStr = std::to_string(stateCount);
6913  op->setCastWidth(RTLWidth(stateStr, stateStr));
6914  op->setOperand(0, rtl->find("cur_state"));
6915 
6916  tempState->connect(op, NULL);
6917  } else {
6918 
6919  tempState->setDefaultDriver(ZERO);
6920  connectSignalToDriverInState(tempState, ONE, state);
6921  }
6922  }
6923 
6924  stateCount += 1;
6925  }
6926 
6927  if (alloc->getDbgInfo()->getOptionPreserveOneHot()) {
6928  RTLSignal *concated = NULL;
6929  for (vector<RTLSignal *>::iterator s_it = statesOneHot.begin(),
6930  s_end = statesOneHot.end();
6931  s_it != s_end; ++s_it) {
6932 
6933  if (!concated) {
6934  concated = *s_it;
6935  } else {
6936  RTLOp *concat = rtl->addOp(RTLOp::Concat);
6937  concat->setOperand(0, *s_it);
6938  concat->setOperand(1, concated);
6939  concated = concat;
6940  }
6941  }
6942  sigCurState->connect(concated);
6943 
6944  string statePortName = Fp->getName().str() + DEBUG_HIERARCHY_PATH_SEP +
6945  sigCurState->getName();
6946  RTLSignal *sigCurStatePort =
6947  rtl->addOut(statePortName, sigCurState->getWidth());
6948  sigCurStatePort->connect(sigCurState, NULL);
6949  dbgStatePorts.push_back(
6950  new RTLDebugPort(sigCurStatePort, this, sigCurState));
6951  }
6952 
6953  // Forward registers that need to be traced to top-level ports
6954  if (alloc->getDbgInfo()->getOptionTraceRegs())
6955  addDebugTraceOutputs();
6956 
6957  for (std::map<Function *, RTLModule *>::iterator
6958  child_it = calledModulesToRtlMap.begin(),
6959  child_end = calledModulesToRtlMap.end();
6960  child_it != child_end; ++child_it) {
6961  Function *childFp = child_it->first;
6962  GenerateRTL *childGenRtl = alloc->getGenerateRTL(childFp);
6963  RTLModule *childRtl = child_it->second;
6964 
6965  // Adds top-level outputs for the signals in the
6966  // instantiated child modules that need to be traced
6967  if (alloc->getDbgInfo()->getOptionTraceRegs()) {
6968  vector<RTLDebugPort *> *childPorts = &(childGenRtl->dbgTracePorts);
6969 
6970  // Connect up each signal
6971  for (vector<RTLDebugPort *>::iterator port_it = childPorts->begin(),
6972  port_end = childPorts->end();
6973  port_it != port_end; ++port_it) {
6974  RTLDebugPort *port = *port_it;
6975  RTLSignal *signal = port->getSignal();
6976 
6977  RTLSignal *newOut =
6978  rtl->addOut(Fp->getName().str() + DEBUG_HIERARCHY_PATH_SEP +
6979  signal->getName(),
6980  signal->getWidth());
6981  childRtl->addOut(signal->getName(), signal->getWidth())
6982  ->connect(newOut);
6983 
6984  dbgTracePorts.push_back(new RTLDebugPort(port, newOut));
6985  }
6986  }
6987 
6988  if (alloc->getDbgInfo()->getOptionPreserveOneHot()) {
6989  // Adds top-level outputs for the state signals in the instantiated
6990  // child modules
6991  vector<RTLDebugPort *> *childPorts = &(childGenRtl->dbgStatePorts);
6992 
6993  // Connect up each signal
6994  for (vector<RTLDebugPort *>::iterator port_it = childPorts->begin(),
6995  port_end = childPorts->end();
6996  port_it != port_end; ++port_it) {
6997  RTLDebugPort *port = *port_it;
6998  RTLSignal *signal = port->getSignal();
6999 
7000  RTLSignal *newOut =
7001  rtl->addOut(Fp->getName().str() + DEBUG_HIERARCHY_PATH_SEP +
7002  signal->getName(),
7003  signal->getWidth());
7004  childRtl->addOut(signal->getName(), signal->getWidth())
7005  ->connect(newOut);
7006 
7007  dbgStatePorts.push_back(new RTLDebugPort(port, newOut));
7008  }
7009  }
7010 
7011  childRtl->addParam(DEBUG_PARAM_NAME_PARENT_INST, DEBUG_PARAM_NAME_INST);
7012 
7013  string activeInstanceSigName =
7014  verilogName(childFp) + "_" + DEBUG_SIGNAL_NAME_ACTIVE_INST;
7015  RTLSignal *activeInstanceSig = rtl->find(activeInstanceSigName);
7016  childRtl->addOut(DEBUG_SIGNAL_NAME_ACTIVE_INST)
7017  ->connect(activeInstanceSig);
7018 
7019  if (!alloc->getDbgInfo()->getOptionPreserveOneHot()) {
7020  string currentStateSigName =
7021  verilogName(childFp) + "_" + DEBUG_SIGNAL_NAME_CURRENT_STATE;
7022  RTLSignal *currentStateSig = rtl->find(currentStateSigName);
7023  childRtl->addOut(DEBUG_SIGNAL_NAME_CURRENT_STATE)
7024  ->connect(currentStateSig);
7025  }
7026  }
7027 
7028  // By default, drive the active instance by the instance parameter
7029  sigActiveInst->setDefaultDriver(instanceParam);
7030 
7031  // If reset, active instance should be 0
7032  RTLOp *cond;
7033  cond = rtl->addOp(RTLOp::EQ);
7034  cond->setOperand(0, rtl->find("reset"));
7035  cond->setOperand(1, ONE);
7036 
7037  sigActiveInst->addCondition(
7038  cond, new RTLConst("0", sigActiveInst->getWidth()), NULL);
7039 }
7040 
7041 // Find all registers that need to be traced from within this module
7042 // and output them to top-level ports
7043 void GenerateRTL::addDebugTraceOutputs() {
7044  set<RTLSignal *> sigTraced;
7045 
7046  // Find all registers that need to be traced from this module
7047  for (vector<DebugVariableLocal *>::iterator var_iter = dbgVars.begin(),
7048  var_end = dbgVars.end();
7049  var_iter != var_end; ++var_iter) {
7050  DebugVariableLocal *var = *var_iter;
7051 
7052  for (vector<DebugValue *>::iterator
7053  dv_it = var->getDbgValues()->begin(),
7054  dv_end = var->getDbgValues()->end();
7055  dv_it != dv_end; ++dv_it) {
7056  DebugValue *val = *dv_it;
7057 
7058  RTLSignal *sigToTrace = NULL;
7059 
7060  if (val->requiresSignalTracing()) {
7061  sigToTrace = rtl->find(val->getSignalName());
7062  assert(sigToTrace);
7063 
7064  if (sigTraced.find(sigToTrace) == sigTraced.end())
7065  sigTraced.insert(sigToTrace);
7066  else
7067  continue;
7068 
7069  string traceName = Fp->getName().str() +
7070  DEBUG_HIERARCHY_PATH_SEP +
7071  sigToTrace->getName();
7072  RTLSignal *s = rtl->addOut(traceName, sigToTrace->getWidth());
7073  s->connect(sigToTrace, NULL);
7074 
7075  RTLDebugPort *newDbgPort =
7076  new RTLDebugPort(s, this, sigToTrace);
7077 
7078  dbgTracePorts.push_back(newDbgPort);
7079  }
7080  }
7081  }
7082 }
7083 
7084 // This recursive function creates a unique ID for each *instance* of each
7085 // module.
7086 // The same GenerateRTL module can be instantiated from multiple parent
7087 // modules, and each parent could be instantiated from different parents, and so
7088 // forth,
7089 // So, this function registers an instanceId with the debugging info for this
7090 // GenerateRTL module, given its parent instance ID.
7091 void GenerateRTL::generateInstances(int parentInstanceId) {
7092  RTLModuleInstance *myInst =
7093  alloc->getDbgInfo()->newInstance(this, parentInstanceId);
7094 
7095  instances.push_back(myInst);
7096  rtl->dbgAddInstanceMapping(parentInstanceId, myInst->getId());
7097 
7098  for (set<Function *>::iterator fp_it = calledModules.begin(),
7099  fp_end = calledModules.end();
7100  fp_it != fp_end; ++fp_it) {
7101  Function *childFp = *fp_it;
7102  GenerateRTL *childGenRtl = alloc->getGenerateRTL(childFp);
7103  childGenRtl->generateInstances(myInst->getId());
7104  }
7105 }
7106 
7107 // This function returns the Debugging info class for a variable,
7108 // specified by the MDNode.
7109 DebugVariableLocal *GenerateRTL::dbgGetVariable(MDNode *metaNode) {
7110  // Check if this variable has already been allocated
7111  for (auto var_it = dbgVars.begin(), e = dbgVars.end(); var_it != e;
7112  ++var_it) {
7113  if ((*var_it)->getMetaNode() == metaNode)
7114  return *var_it;
7115  }
7116 
7117  // If the variable is not already added, allocate a new one
7118  DebugVariableLocal *v = new DebugVariableLocal(metaNode, this);
7119  dbgVars.push_back(v);
7120  return v;
7121 }
7122 
7123 GenerateRTL::~GenerateRTL() {
7124  assert(sched);
7125  assert(sched->getFSM(Fp));
7126  delete sched->getFSM(Fp);
7127  delete sched;
7128  assert(rtl);
7129  delete rtl;
7130  assert(binding);
7131  delete binding;
7132  assert(dag);
7133  delete dag;
7134 }
7135 
7136 } // End legup namespace
